sentences.english: For years, I have felt a void in our relationship.
sentences.chinese: 多年來，我從這段友情中感覺到了空虛。

sentences.english: As for the congratulations from De Rossi, our friendship goes beyond football.
sentences.chinese: 至於德羅西的祝賀，我想說我們的友情超越了足球。

sentences.english: In fact, the world of friendship there are jealous, that nothing less than love.
sentences.chinese: 其實，友情世界裏也存在着喫醋，那滋味不亞於愛情。

sentences.english: A list of links to other related sites, sometimes called a "blogroll".
sentences.chinese: 其它網站的鏈接列表，有時稱作“友情鏈接”。

sentences.english: People who have close friends naturally enjoy their company.
sentences.chinese: 有至交者，自然享有友情之樂。

sentences.english: Friendship cannot live with ceremony, nor without civility.
sentences.chinese: 友情不能無主套，但也長不了禮貌。

sentences.english: Friendship does not last forever, and no highest power of love.
sentences.chinese: 沒有天長地久的友情，更沒有海枯石爛的愛情。

sentences.english: Love is like a play, your friendship, I have to show.
sentences.chinese: 愛情就像一場戲，你的友情客串，我卻傾情演出。
友情是知趣相投的共享。

sentences.english: The times of comradeship in sports and play are full of meaning.
sentences.chinese: 這個通過運動或遊戲培養友情的時代，是極有意義的。

sentences.english: You and I are still in friendship, thousands of miles difficult obstacles.
sentences.chinese: 你我友情依然在，千山萬水難阻礙。

sentences.english: He spun a yarn about his friendship with the royal family.
sentences.chinese: 他胡謅了一通所謂他與王室之間友情的故事。

sentences.english: But the friendship has been brilliant at times after losing ground.
sentences.chinese: 但友情卻一直絢麗在時光節節敗退後。

sentences.english: Don’t let a little dispute injure a great friendship.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓小小的爭執損傷一份偉大的友情。

sentences.english: Marion’s friendships were as legendary as her scripts.
sentences.chinese: 馬里昂的友情跟她的劇本一樣傳奇。

sentences.english: In my childhood days, I had contracted a strong friendship with him and his sisters.
sentences.chinese: 童年時代，我與他和他的姐妹們友情甚篤。

definition: affection/family love/love, esp. within a married couple or between parents and children
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
love is more solid than gold (idiom)
good friend/(slang) a visit from Aunt Flo (menstrual period)
a gentleman's friendship, insipid as water (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])
pinyin: jun1 zi3 zhi1 jiao1 dan4 ru2 shui3

definition: in love with/to feel deeply attached to
